doc.field: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
Judge J C Brooks Home--Mary Fitch Home 1850s--John M Perry ownership 1820

1820s: Patton House boarded UVA Students; 1850s: Brick I-House, Paired Column Portico, Square Columns with Panels 3 Bay, Hipped Roof, Tripartite Window; 1850s: Brick Dormitory; 1907: 2 Story Brick, Tetrastyle Portico, Suspended Balcony with Chippendale Railings, Lunette in Tympanum, Fanlight, Flemish Bond, 6/6, 6/6/6, Triple Hung Sash, Blinds, 5 Bay, 2 Pile, Hipped Roof
survey data: Virginia Road Traces--Charlottesville's Historic Landmarks Study Surveys
Patton House--Brick I-House & Brick Dormitory--Brick I-House Razed--Dormitory Razed--2 Story Brick house which later became a bank
